options.name: Beginner Crusher
options.description: Gain +1 Attack and +1 Damage with Crushing Weapons. Gain a Fighting Stance.

options.name: Reaction : Flank
options.description: When an Allied Creature makes a Melee Attack against a target within your Melee Range, you can make an Attack against that same target with a 1d4 Bonus.

options.name: Novice Crusher
options.description: Gain +1 Attack with Crushing Weapons and Learn a Fighting Stance from the Stance Table

options.name: Action : Double Tap
options.description: Roll 2 Attack Dice and use the higher result. If one is a True Hit, add an additional 1d8 Damage to the Attack. If both are True Hits, add 3d8.

options.name: Reaction : Batter Aside
options.description: When a Creature makes a Melee Attack against you, make an Attack against them as a Reaction. If your Attack would hit, instead of dealing Damage, the Attack roll that triggered this Reaction takes a 1d4 penalty and cannot be used again until the start of your next turn.

options.name: Journeyman Crusher
options.description: Gain +1 Attack with Crushing Weapons and gain access to the Attack of Opportunity Reaction

options.name: Reaction : Kneecap
options.description: When a Creature moves out of your Area of Control willfully, make a Bludgeoning Attack against them. If the Attack hit, it lowers their Movement Speed by a number of Units equal to your Bludgeoning Damage Bonus Modifier, to a minimum of 2, until the start of their next turn.

options.name: Free Action : Forceful Blow
options.description: When you hit a Target with a Bludgeoning Weapon, deal extra Damage equal to your Strength Modifier.

options.name: Expert Crusher
options.description: Gain Critical Hits and Gain +1 Attack with Crushing Weapons

options.name: Action : Bludgeon
options.description: Make an Attack with a -1d4 Modifier.  If the Attack hits, the Target suffers a Penalty equal to your 1d4 roll to their Block, Dodge and Resistance until the start of your next turn.

options.name: Stunning Blow
options.description: Large and smaller Creatures that you score a True Hit on with Crushing Weapons give your target the Stunned Condition.

options.name: Master Crusher
options.description: Gain Brutal Critical Hits with Crushing Weapons and Gain +1 Attack with Crushing Weapons

options.name: Improvised Weapons
options.description: Any Object over 5 Mass or any Creature Grappled by you that is 2 Sizes Smaller or more, becomes a Crushing Weapon. A Creature held in this way takes Damage equal to your Crushing Damage Bonus Modifier when used to make an Attack.

options.name: Action : Power Crush
options.description: Make a Shove Attack against a Large or Smaller Creature. If Successful, you push the Creature Back 2 Units and Leap towards them and make a Weapon Attack with a +3 Attack Bonus.

options.name: Grandmaster Crusher
options.description: Your Damage Die for Crushing Weapons are upgraded (1-Handed Light: 2d6, 1-Handed Heavy: 2d8, 2-Handed Light: 3d6, 2-Handed Heavy: 3d8)
